descent.name: Descent Arc
descent.description: Going down into the deep cryptographic underworld, culminating in the ultimate boss and the Sceptre of Privacy.

ascent.name: Ascent Arc
ascent.description: The story flips: You climb up, escaping the depths, bringing privacy back to the surface world.

zones.name: Level 1: The Unshielded Approach
zones.description: You step into the newborn tunnels where every unshielded breath feels too loud against the stone.
zones.lore: The entrance to the Tunnels of Privacy, where novice adventurers first learn the importance of shielding their data from prying eyes.

zones.name: Level 2: The Unshielded Approach
zones.description: Faint daylight fades behind you as Dustlings stir, testing how careless you are with exposed data.
zones.lore: The entrance to the Tunnels of Privacy, where novice adventurers first learn the importance of shielding their data from prying eyes.

zones.name: Level 3: The Unshielded Approach
zones.description: Metadata Wisps drift like fireflies, trying to tag your every move with little glowing labels.
zones.lore: The entrance to the Tunnels of Privacy, where novice adventurers first learn the importance of shielding their data from prying eyes.

zones.name: Level 4: The Unshielded Approach
zones.description: The first crude traps hum ahead, built to punish anyone who walks through life with doors wide open.
zones.lore: The entrance to the Tunnels of Privacy, where novice adventurers first learn the importance of shielding their data from prying eyes.

zones.name: Level 5: The Unshielded Approach
zones.description: A cracked support beam reveals an older passage, scarred by the consequences of careless sharing.
zones.lore: The entrance to the Tunnels of Privacy, where novice adventurers first learn the importance of shielding their data from prying eyes.

zones.name: Level 6: The Unshielded Approach
zones.description: You tread past scratched warnings from earlier explorers who learned too late what leaking costs.
zones.lore: The entrance to the Tunnels of Privacy, where novice adventurers first learn the importance of shielding their data from prying eyes.

zones.name: Level 7: The Unshielded Approach
zones.description: Leak Imps chatter in the dark, sniffing for patterns in your path and habits in your timing.
zones.lore: The entrance to the Tunnels of Privacy, where novice adventurers first learn the importance of shielding their data from prying eyes.

zones.name: Level 8: The Unshielded Approach
zones.description: A narrow bridge of rusted grates forces you to cross slowly, fully aware of who might be watching.
zones.lore: The entrance to the Tunnels of Privacy, where novice adventurers first learn the importance of shielding their data from prying eyes.

zones.name: Level 9: The Unshielded Approach
zones.description: Torches gutter as the last hints of surface wind vanish, and the tunnels claim your attention fully.
zones.lore: The entrance to the Tunnels of Privacy, where novice adventurers first learn the importance of shielding their data from prying eyes.

zones.name: Level 10: The Unshielded Approach
zones.description: A silent chamber teaches you the first rule of survival here: shield first, move second, talk last.
zones.lore: The entrance to the Tunnels of Privacy, where novice adventurers first learn the importance of shielding their data from prying eyes.

zones.name: Level 11: The Broken Ledger Halls
zones.description: You enter halls lined with shattered ledgers, each page a monument to lives spent under a spotlight.
zones.lore: Ancient halls where the records of transparent transactions crumble, haunted by entities that feed on exposed financial data.

zones.name: Level 12: The Broken Ledger Halls
zones.description: Watcher Golems patrol broken aisles, their glass eyes sweeping for the comfortingly predictable.
zones.lore: Ancient halls where the records of transparent transactions crumble, haunted by entities that feed on exposed financial data.

zones.name: Level 13: The Broken Ledger Halls
zones.description: Auditor Fragments scrape across marble floors, reconstructing half-truths from crumbs of behavior.
zones.lore: Ancient halls where the records of transparent transactions crumble, haunted by entities that feed on exposed financial data.

zones.name: Level 14: The Broken Ledger Halls
zones.description: You pass pillars carved with transaction histories, every mistake immortalized in public stone.
zones.lore: Ancient halls where the records of transparent transactions crumble, haunted by entities that feed on exposed financial data.

zones.name: Level 15: The Broken Ledger Halls
zones.description: A shattered vault door hangs open, its hinges torn by something that hated transparency itself.
zones.lore: Ancient halls where the records of transparent transactions crumble, haunted by entities that feed on exposed financial data.

zones.name: Level 16: The Broken Ledger Halls
zones.description: Dust motes swirl around abandoned books, each ledger a story of someone who never got to hide.
zones.lore: Ancient halls where the records of transparent transactions crumble, haunted by entities that feed on exposed financial data.

zones.name: Level 17: The Broken Ledger Halls
zones.description: The air vibrates with the echo of old audits, as if the walls still demand explanations from you.
zones.lore: Ancient halls where the records of transparent transactions crumble, haunted by entities that feed on exposed financial data.

zones.name: Level 18: The Broken Ledger Halls
zones.description: Watcher Golems glitch and stutter, trying to reconcile what you are with what the records allow.
zones.lore: Ancient halls where the records of transparent transactions crumble, haunted by entities that feed on exposed financial data.

zones.name: Level 19: The Broken Ledger Halls
zones.description: You cross a balcony above an endless archive, shelves collapsing under the weight of exposed lives.
zones.lore: Ancient halls where the records of transparent transactions crumble, haunted by entities that feed on exposed financial data.

zones.name: Level 20: The Broken Ledger Halls
zones.description: At the end of the hall, you feel a quiet defiance rise: not every page needs to be written in ink.
zones.lore: Ancient halls where the records of transparent transactions crumble, haunted by entities that feed on exposed financial data.

zones.name: Level 21: The Trusted Setup Catacombs
zones.description: Stone steps carry you down into the Catacombs, where failed ceremonies sleep beside uneasy secrets.
zones.lore: Deep crypts containing the remnants of cryptographic ceremonies past. Failed trusted setups left behind corrupted parameters that now walk as undead.

zones.name: Level 22: The Trusted Setup Catacombs
zones.description: Ceremony Ghosts drift between coffins of broken parameters, whispering about trust given too freely.
zones.lore: Deep crypts containing the remnants of cryptographic ceremonies past. Failed trusted setups left behind corrupted parameters that now walk as undead.

zones.name: Level 23: The Trusted Setup Catacombs
zones.description: You brush past sigils carved for long-dead rituals, their intent pure but their execution flawed.
zones.lore: Deep crypts containing the remnants of cryptographic ceremonies past. Failed trusted setups left behind corrupted parameters that now walk as undead.

zones.name: Level 24: The Trusted Setup Catacombs
zones.description: Toxic Waste Slimes bubble in cracked basins, reminders of what happens when power is not disposed of.
zones.lore: Deep crypts containing the remnants of cryptographic ceremonies past. Failed trusted setups left behind corrupted parameters that now walk as undead.

zones.name: Level 25: The Trusted Setup Catacombs
zones.description: Rows of masks line the walls, each worn by a participant who swore to vanish after the ritual ended.
zones.lore: Deep crypts containing the remnants of cryptographic ceremonies past. Failed trusted setups left behind corrupted parameters that now walk as undead.

zones.name: Level 26: The Trusted Setup Catacombs
zones.description: Parameter Wraiths coil around rusted braziers, feeding on doubts you did not realize you carried.
zones.lore: Deep crypts containing the remnants of cryptographic ceremonies past. Failed trusted setups left behind corrupted parameters that now walk as undead.

zones.name: Level 27: The Trusted Setup Catacombs
zones.description: You find a circle of stone chairs, each empty, each humming with the memory of a promise to forget.
zones.lore: Deep crypts containing the remnants of cryptographic ceremonies past. Failed trusted setups left behind corrupted parameters that now walk as undead.

zones.name: Level 28: The Trusted Setup Catacombs
zones.description: A sealed crypt door rattles as unseen voices argue about whether any setup can ever be fully trusted.
zones.lore: Deep crypts containing the remnants of cryptographic ceremonies past. Failed trusted setups left behind corrupted parameters that now walk as undead.

zones.name: Level 29: The Trusted Setup Catacombs
zones.description: Tunnels bend into a low chamber where discarded keys glow faintly, no longer safe but not yet dead.
zones.lore: Deep crypts containing the remnants of cryptographic ceremonies past. Failed trusted setups left behind corrupted parameters that now walk as undead.

zones.name: Level 30: The Trusted Setup Catacombs
zones.description: Beyond a final arch, you feel the Catacombs release you, carrying forward a healthier suspicion.
zones.lore: Deep crypts containing the remnants of cryptographic ceremonies past. Failed trusted setups left behind corrupted parameters that now walk as undead.

zones.name: Level 31: The Forked Maze
zones.description: You step into corridors that do not agree with themselves, each turn arguing with the last.
zones.lore: A labyrinth where reality itself forks and merges. Unstable consensus creates corridors that shift and change, trapping unwary travelers in orphaned branches.

zones.name: Level 32: The Forked Maze
zones.description: Block Ghosts flicker in and out of existence, replaying alternative pasts that never quite settled.
zones.lore: A labyrinth where reality itself forks and merges. Unstable consensus creates corridors that shift and change, trapping unwary travelers in orphaned branches.

zones.name: Level 33: The Forked Maze
zones.description: Walls stretch and contract as Consensus Shifters rewrite which paths were ever really here.
zones.lore: A labyrinth where reality itself forks and merges. Unstable consensus creates corridors that shift and change, trapping unwary travelers in orphaned branches.

zones.name: Level 34: The Forked Maze
zones.description: You follow a route that dissolves behind you, orphaned like a forgotten chain of decisions.
zones.lore: A labyrinth where reality itself forks and merges. Unstable consensus creates corridors that shift and change, trapping unwary travelers in orphaned branches.

zones.name: Level 35: The Forked Maze
zones.description: Fork Sprites dance at intersections, offering shortcuts that vanish the moment you commit.
zones.lore: A labyrinth where reality itself forks and merges. Unstable consensus creates corridors that shift and change, trapping unwary travelers in orphaned branches.

zones.name: Level 36: The Forked Maze
zones.description: Reorg Phantoms sweep through the maze, rolling back your progress just to see if you notice.
zones.lore: A labyrinth where reality itself forks and merges. Unstable consensus creates corridors that shift and change, trapping unwary travelers in orphaned branches.

zones.name: Level 37: The Forked Maze
zones.description: An entire hallway resets in front of you, insisting that you arrived from a direction you never took.
zones.lore: A labyrinth where reality itself forks and merges. Unstable consensus creates corridors that shift and change, trapping unwary travelers in orphaned branches.

zones.name: Level 38: The Forked Maze
zones.description: You glimpse a version of yourself down a parallel passage, making a choice you did not make.
zones.lore: A labyrinth where reality itself forks and merges. Unstable consensus creates corridors that shift and change, trapping unwary travelers in orphaned branches.

zones.name: Level 39: The Forked Maze
zones.description: A spiral stairwell loops back on itself twice, forcing you to trust your memory more than the map.
zones.lore: A labyrinth where reality itself forks and merges. Unstable consensus creates corridors that shift and change, trapping unwary travelers in orphaned branches.

zones.name: Level 40: The Forked Maze
zones.description: At the maze’s heart, you realize stability is not given; it is fought for one confirmed step at a time.
zones.lore: A labyrinth where reality itself forks and merges. Unstable consensus creates corridors that shift and change, trapping unwary travelers in orphaned branches.

zones.name: Level 41: The Fungibility Labyrinth
zones.description: The floor tiles shimmer with stains that reshape into different coins each time you blink.
zones.lore: A twisted maze where coins lose their fungibility. Tainted assets multiply like hydra heads, and the very concept of equal value becomes corrupted.

zones.name: Level 42: The Fungibility Labyrinth
zones.description: Tainted Coin Hydras hiss as their heads split, every hit spawning new accusations of impurity.
zones.lore: A twisted maze where coins lose their fungibility. Tainted assets multiply like hydra heads, and the very concept of equal value becomes corrupted.

zones.name: Level 43: The Fungibility Labyrinth
zones.description: Value Illusions paint some corridors in gold and others in rust, though they all lead the same way.
zones.lore: A twisted maze where coins lose their fungibility. Tainted assets multiply like hydra heads, and the very concept of equal value becomes corrupted.

zones.name: Level 44: The Fungibility Labyrinth
zones.description: Purity Shifters slither along the walls, branding some paths acceptable and others forever suspect.
zones.lore: A twisted maze where coins lose their fungibility. Tainted assets multiply like hydra heads, and the very concept of equal value becomes corrupted.

zones.name: Level 45: The Fungibility Labyrinth
zones.description: You pass a fountain that pours identical coins into two pools, yet only one is deemed worthy.
zones.lore: A twisted maze where coins lose their fungibility. Tainted assets multiply like hydra heads, and the very concept of equal value becomes corrupted.

zones.name: Level 46: The Fungibility Labyrinth
zones.description: Fungibility Leeches cling to discarded purses, draining worth based on rumors rather than reality.
zones.lore: A twisted maze where coins lose their fungibility. Tainted assets multiply like hydra heads, and the very concept of equal value becomes corrupted.

zones.name: Level 47: The Fungibility Labyrinth
zones.description: A mural shows merchants refusing coins not for what they are, but for where they once have been.
zones.lore: A twisted maze where coins lose their fungibility. Tainted assets multiply like hydra heads, and the very concept of equal value becomes corrupted.

zones.name: Level 48: The Fungibility Labyrinth
zones.description: Hydra shadows loom across a crossroads, daring you to believe that history defines value forever.
zones.lore: A twisted maze where coins lose their fungibility. Tainted assets multiply like hydra heads, and the very concept of equal value becomes corrupted.

zones.name: Level 49: The Fungibility Labyrinth
zones.description: As you navigate the labyrinth, you feel the weight of labels that cling to money and to people alike.
zones.lore: A twisted maze where coins lose their fungibility. Tainted assets multiply like hydra heads, and the very concept of equal value becomes corrupted.

zones.name: Level 50: The Fungibility Labyrinth
zones.description: At the exit, you swear that in your world, a coin will be just a coin again, nothing more, nothing less.
zones.lore: A twisted maze where coins lose their fungibility. Tainted assets multiply like hydra heads, and the very concept of equal value becomes corrupted.

zones.name: Level 51: The Counterfeit Vaults
zones.description: You descend into vaults that were never meant to exist, their doors etched with counterfeit sigils.
zones.lore: Forbidden vaults where counterfeit creation was attempted. The failed experiments left behind entities that represent inflation, double-spending, and supply corruption.

zones.name: Level 52: The Counterfeit Vaults
zones.description: Nullifier Shades drift between safety deposit boxes, erasing traces that were never honestly earned.
zones.lore: Forbidden vaults where counterfeit creation was attempted. The failed experiments left behind entities that represent inflation, double-spending, and supply corruption.

zones.name: Level 53: The Counterfeit Vaults
zones.description: Supply Phantoms swell and shrink in the corners, mocking any attempt to count what truly exists.
zones.lore: Forbidden vaults where counterfeit creation was attempted. The failed experiments left behind entities that represent inflation, double-spending, and supply corruption.

zones.name: Level 54: The Counterfeit Vaults
zones.description: Issuance Oozes seep from cracked safes, multiplying value that should have stayed constant.
zones.lore: Forbidden vaults where counterfeit creation was attempted. The failed experiments left behind entities that represent inflation, double-spending, and supply corruption.

zones.name: Level 55: The Counterfeit Vaults
zones.description: Double-Spend Specters replay the same transaction in overlapping echoes, demanding to be believed.
zones.lore: Forbidden vaults where counterfeit creation was attempted. The failed experiments left behind entities that represent inflation, double-spending, and supply corruption.

zones.name: Level 56: The Counterfeit Vaults
zones.description: You cross a chamber where scales refuse to balance, their weights flickering between numbers.
zones.lore: Forbidden vaults where counterfeit creation was attempted. The failed experiments left behind entities that represent inflation, double-spending, and supply corruption.

zones.name: Level 57: The Counterfeit Vaults
zones.description: Vault doors open onto empty rooms, reminders that guarantees mean nothing without verifiable truth.
zones.lore: Forbidden vaults where counterfeit creation was attempted. The failed experiments left behind entities that represent inflation, double-spending, and supply corruption.

zones.name: Level 58: The Counterfeit Vaults
zones.description: A cold ledger lies on a podium, its ink rewriting totals every time you glance away.
zones.lore: Forbidden vaults where counterfeit creation was attempted. The failed experiments left behind entities that represent inflation, double-spending, and supply corruption.

zones.name: Level 59: The Counterfeit Vaults
zones.description: The deeper vaults hum with the anger of those who trusted balances that never really added up.
zones.lore: Forbidden vaults where counterfeit creation was attempted. The failed experiments left behind entities that represent inflation, double-spending, and supply corruption.

zones.name: Level 60: The Counterfeit Vaults
zones.description: Leaving the Counterfeit Vaults, you cling tighter to systems that can prove, not just promise.
zones.lore: Forbidden vaults where counterfeit creation was attempted. The failed experiments left behind entities that represent inflation, double-spending, and supply corruption.

zones.name: Level 61: The Orchard Sanctum
zones.description: You enter the Orchard Sanctum, where shielded temples ring with the quiet hum of private proofs.
zones.lore: Sacred temples dedicated to the Orchard protocol. Once holy ground for shielded transactions, now defended by corrupted guardians who test all who enter.

zones.name: Level 62: The Orchard Sanctum
zones.description: Corrupted Proof Angels glide between pillars, testing whether you understand what you are defending.
zones.lore: Sacred temples dedicated to the Orchard protocol. Once holy ground for shielded transactions, now defended by corrupted guardians who test all who enter.

zones.name: Level 63: The Orchard Sanctum
zones.description: Address Spirits swirl around unified shrines, inviting you to consolidate without exposing yourself.
zones.lore: Sacred temples dedicated to the Orchard protocol. Once holy ground for shielded transactions, now defended by corrupted guardians who test all who enter.

zones.name: Level 64: The Orchard Sanctum
zones.description: Shielded Sentinels line a cloister, each one a living firewall between curiosity and your reality.
zones.lore: Sacred temples dedicated to the Orchard protocol. Once holy ground for shielded transactions, now defended by corrupted guardians who test all who enter.

zones.name: Level 65: The Orchard Sanctum
zones.description: You watch a transaction pass through a glass altar, its details dissolving into pure protected light.
zones.lore: Sacred temples dedicated to the Orchard protocol. Once holy ground for shielded transactions, now defended by corrupted guardians who test all who enter.

zones.name: Level 66: The Orchard Sanctum
zones.description: A side chapel shows murals of people paying, giving, and surviving without leaving a public scar.
zones.lore: Sacred temples dedicated to the Orchard protocol. Once holy ground for shielded transactions, now defended by corrupted guardians who test all who enter.

zones.name: Level 67: The Orchard Sanctum
zones.description: The air tastes clean here, like a network where privacy is the default rather than a desperate add-on.
zones.lore: Sacred temples dedicated to the Orchard protocol. Once holy ground for shielded transactions, now defended by corrupted guardians who test all who enter.

zones.name: Level 68: The Orchard Sanctum
zones.description: An angel made of fractured proof fragments asks, without words, if you will use this power gently.
zones.lore: Sacred temples dedicated to the Orchard protocol. Once holy ground for shielded transactions, now defended by corrupted guardians who test all who enter.

zones.name: Level 69: The Orchard Sanctum
zones.description: Beyond a curtain of light, you glimpse a thriving world built on shielded transactions and trust.
zones.lore: Sacred temples dedicated to the Orchard protocol. Once holy ground for shielded transactions, now defended by corrupted guardians who test all who enter.

zones.name: Level 70: The Orchard Sanctum
zones.description: You leave the Sanctum carrying a new certainty: privacy is not secrecy; it is dignity made protocol.
zones.lore: Sacred temples dedicated to the Orchard protocol. Once holy ground for shielded transactions, now defended by corrupted guardians who test all who enter.

zones.name: Level 71: The Halo Spiral
zones.description: The Halo Spiral begins as a gentle ramp, then folds into itself like a proof reshaping reality.
zones.lore: A spiraling descent through recursive proof verification. Reality folds upon itself as Halo proofs create infinite loops and paradoxes that manifest as hostile entities.

zones.name: Level 72: The Halo Spiral
zones.description: Proof-Clones step from the walls, each one a valid echo of a fact you have already faced.
zones.lore: A spiraling descent through recursive proof verification. Reality folds upon itself as Halo proofs create infinite loops and paradoxes that manifest as hostile entities.

zones.name: Level 73: The Halo Spiral
zones.description: Recursion Loops twist corridors into rings, daring you to prove that you have really moved at all.
zones.lore: A spiraling descent through recursive proof verification. Reality folds upon itself as Halo proofs create infinite loops and paradoxes that manifest as hostile entities.

zones.name: Level 74: The Halo Spiral
zones.description: Anti-Entropy Storms flare in the distance, tearing down sloppy assumptions about how things work.
zones.lore: A spiraling descent through recursive proof verification. Reality folds upon itself as Halo proofs create infinite loops and paradoxes that manifest as hostile entities.

zones.name: Level 75: The Halo Spiral
zones.description: You cross platforms suspended over bottomless stacks of nested arguments, each one rigorously linked.
zones.lore: A spiraling descent through recursive proof verification. Reality folds upon itself as Halo proofs create infinite loops and paradoxes that manifest as hostile entities.

zones.name: Level 76: The Halo Spiral
zones.description: Halo Guardians test you with challenges that can only be answered by what you already know to be true.
zones.lore: A spiraling descent through recursive proof verification. Reality folds upon itself as Halo proofs create infinite loops and paradoxes that manifest as hostile entities.

zones.name: Level 77: The Halo Spiral
zones.description: The spiral tightens, and each new turn feels less like travel and more like refining a single idea.
zones.lore: A spiraling descent through recursive proof verification. Reality folds upon itself as Halo proofs create infinite loops and paradoxes that manifest as hostile entities.

zones.name: Level 78: The Halo Spiral
zones.description: Proof-Clones confront you in pairs, demanding you distinguish between copy, lie, and verified echo.
zones.lore: A spiraling descent through recursive proof verification. Reality folds upon itself as Halo proofs create infinite loops and paradoxes that manifest as hostile entities.

zones.name: Level 79: The Halo Spiral
zones.description: Lightning forks through the spiral, burning away shortcuts that would compromise correctness.
zones.lore: A spiraling descent through recursive proof verification. Reality folds upon itself as Halo proofs create infinite loops and paradoxes that manifest as hostile entities.

zones.name: Level 80: The Halo Spiral
zones.description: At the spiral’s threshold, you grasp that real power is circular: it returns to verify itself again.
zones.lore: A spiraling descent through recursive proof verification. Reality folds upon itself as Halo proofs create infinite loops and paradoxes that manifest as hostile entities.

zones.name: Level 81: The Identity Depths
zones.description: The Identity Depths welcome you with mirrors that do not quite match the way you remember yourself.
zones.lore: The deepest psychological realm where identity itself is under attack. Sybil attacks manifest as swarms of false identities, and maintaining your true self becomes the greatest challenge.

zones.name: Level 82: The Identity Depths
zones.description: Sybil Illusions crowd the corridor, each insisting they are the one true you who deserves control.
zones.lore: The deepest psychological realm where identity itself is under attack. Sybil attacks manifest as swarms of false identities, and maintaining your true self becomes the greatest challenge.

zones.name: Level 83: The Identity Depths
zones.description: Multiplicity Monsters lurk behind choices, ready to exploit every extra face you leave unguarded.
zones.lore: The deepest psychological realm where identity itself is under attack. Sybil attacks manifest as swarms of false identities, and maintaining your true self becomes the greatest challenge.

zones.name: Level 84: The Identity Depths
zones.description: False-Self Mimics copy your stance and timing, then turn those patterns against nearby allies.
zones.lore: The deepest psychological realm where identity itself is under attack. Sybil attacks manifest as swarms of false identities, and maintaining your true self becomes the greatest challenge.

zones.name: Level 85: The Identity Depths
zones.description: An entire hall of masks offers tempting shortcuts: easier names, simpler roles, less responsibility.
zones.lore: The deepest psychological realm where identity itself is under attack. Sybil attacks manifest as swarms of false identities, and maintaining your true self becomes the greatest challenge.

zones.name: Level 86: The Identity Depths
zones.description: Identity Storms roar overhead, trying to rip apart the thin thread that ties your actions to your name.
zones.lore: The deepest psychological realm where identity itself is under attack. Sybil attacks manifest as swarms of false identities, and maintaining your true self becomes the greatest challenge.

zones.name: Level 87: The Identity Depths
zones.description: You pass a shrine where broken credentials lie in piles, each one a trust relationship gone wrong.
zones.lore: The deepest psychological realm where identity itself is under attack. Sybil attacks manifest as swarms of false identities, and maintaining your true self becomes the greatest challenge.

zones.name: Level 88: The Identity Depths
zones.description: A bridge of shifting profiles forces you to cross while everything about you tries to blur.
zones.lore: The deepest psychological realm where identity itself is under attack. Sybil attacks manifest as swarms of false identities, and maintaining your true self becomes the greatest challenge.

zones.name: Level 89: The Identity Depths
zones.description: You steady yourself by remembering who you choose to be, not who the system expects you to be.
zones.lore: The deepest psychological realm where identity itself is under attack. Sybil attacks manifest as swarms of false identities, and maintaining your true self becomes the greatest challenge.

zones.name: Level 90: The Identity Depths
zones.description: Emerging from the Depths, you understand that one well-anchored self beats a thousand forged ones.
zones.lore: The deepest psychological realm where identity itself is under attack. Sybil attacks manifest as swarms of false identities, and maintaining your true self becomes the greatest challenge.

zones.name: Level 91: Descent to the Core
zones.description: The Descent to the Core begins in near-total silence, broken only by the grind of distant machinery.
zones.lore: The final descent before the Core. Total darkness presses in as decentralization itself strains under immense pressure. Proto-boss entities herald the coming of the Centralizer.

zones.name: Level 92: Descent to the Core
zones.description: Centralization Creepers cling to the walls, feeding on any design that funnels power to one point.
zones.lore: The final descent before the Core. Total darkness presses in as decentralization itself strains under immense pressure. Proto-boss entities herald the coming of the Centralizer.

zones.name: Level 93: Descent to the Core
zones.description: Pressure Wraiths crowd the edges of your vision, whispering how much easier it is to let one entity rule.
zones.lore: The final descent before the Core. Total darkness presses in as decentralization itself strains under immense pressure. Proto-boss entities herald the coming of the Centralizer.

zones.name: Level 94: Descent to the Core
zones.description: Darkness Incarnates pool in the corners, thick with the comfort of letting someone else decide for you.
zones.lore: The final descent before the Core. Total darkness presses in as decentralization itself strains under immense pressure. Proto-boss entities herald the coming of the Centralizer.

zones.name: Level 95: Descent to the Core
zones.description: Proto-boss entities loom in the shadows, unfinished shapes of tyrants that almost seized everything.
zones.lore: The final descent before the Core. Total darkness presses in as decentralization itself strains under immense pressure. Proto-boss entities herald the coming of the Centralizer.

zones.name: Level 96: Descent to the Core
zones.description: The floor shakes with the heartbeat of the Core, each pulse a reminder of how fragile freedom is.
zones.lore: The final descent before the Core. Total darkness presses in as decentralization itself strains under immense pressure. Proto-boss entities herald the coming of the Centralizer.

zones.name: Level 97: Descent to the Core
zones.description: You walk past wreckage from earlier rebellions, crushed under the weight of a single, giant will.
zones.lore: The final descent before the Core. Total darkness presses in as decentralization itself strains under immense pressure. Proto-boss entities herald the coming of the Centralizer.

zones.name: Level 98: Descent to the Core
zones.description: The tunnel narrows, forcing you to move alone, without crowds or systems to hide behind.
zones.lore: The final descent before the Core. Total darkness presses in as decentralization itself strains under immense pressure. Proto-boss entities herald the coming of the Centralizer.

zones.name: Level 99: Descent to the Core
zones.description: At the final gate, the air tastes like cold metal and old decisions that centralized the world.
zones.lore: The final descent before the Core. Total darkness presses in as decentralization itself strains under immense pressure. Proto-boss entities herald the coming of the Centralizer.

zones.name: Level 100: The Core
zones.description: You step into the Core itself, face to face with the Centralizer, and raise the Sceptre of Privacy high.

boss.name: The Centralizer
boss.title: World-Eating Machine-God
boss.description: The one true final boss of the entire storyline. A world-eating machine-god that thrives on concentration of power, surveillance, single points of failure, and economic oppression.

reward.name: The Sceptre of Privacy
reward.description: Mythical artifact forged from shielded proof light, distributed consensus fire, entropy crystals, and the last purified nullifier seal.

zones.lore: The heart of all corruption. Here dwells the Centralizer, the antithesis of everything Zcash stands for. Only by defeating this entity can privacy be restored to the world.

zones.name: The Rising Tunnels
zones.description: Fight upward against collapsing caverns and corrupted constructs
zones.lore: The ascent begins! Armed with the Sceptre of Privacy, heroes fight upward through collapsing caverns. Echo monsters - weaker versions of previous threats - attempt to stop your rise.

zones.name: The Breaking Shadows
zones.description: Mid-ascent enemies attempt to reclaim the Sceptre
zones.lore: The shadows fight back! Desperate enemies attempt to reclaim the Sceptre of Privacy. But the light of the surface grows brighter as you climb ever higher.

zones.name: The Great Uprising
zones.description: Villages, towns, and resistance factions cheer you on
zones.lore: Hope returns! Villages, towns, and resistance factions greet the heroes as liberators. Light replaces darkness, monsters become rare, and the world begins to heal.

zones.name: The Air of Freedom
zones.description: Open caverns resembling the surface world
zones.lore: Freedom approaches! Open caverns resemble the surface world. Wildlife returns, shops and shrines appear, and only occasional minibosses tied to 'unfinished business' remain.

zones.name: The Final Boss Rush
zones.description: THE ASCENT GAUNTLET - Final remnants of the Centralizer's power

gauntletBosses.name: The Auditor Titan Shade
gauntletBosses.description: A massive echo of surveillance past

gauntletBosses.name: The Last Forking Wyrm
gauntletBosses.description: The final serpent of consensus instability

gauntletBosses.name: The Fungibility Hydra Remnant
gauntletBosses.description: Last heads of the taint corruption

zones.lore: The final gauntlet! Not story bosses, but the remaining echoes of the Centralizer's power. Seven mighty foes stand between the heroes and complete freedom.
